summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Seattle Municipal Code (S.M.C.) Chapter 20.46 ("WMBE" Ordinance 109113) as last amended by Ordinance 111537) to allow appeal to the Hearing Examiner of revocations of Women's Business Enterprise ("WMBE"), Minority Business Enterprise ("MBE"), Combination Women's and Minority Business ("Combination WMBE") and Disadvantaged Business ("DB") certifications.
